sections.comments: Course is delivered entirely online via UBC Canvas.  To access the course module, go to www.canvas.ubc.caNote: Any non-MHSc, SPPH students wishing to register in this course, please contact Emily van Gulik at emily.vangulik@ubc.ca. For non-SPPH students, please contact the instructor and visit http://spph.ubc.ca/courses/graduate-courses/visiting-students/.

description: Principles and methods of epidemiology are applied to clinical problems. Evaluation and design of laboratory and clinical tests and of therapeutic interventions.
